It's the Almodovar's 1992 movie with Penelope Cruz and Javier Bardem?
Why the quality of this movie is so poor? Isn't a real DVD?

My guess is it's been ripped from DVD, had the subtitles burnt into the video with some software, perhaps during the re-burning process. In other words, this is not a direct copy of the original DVD. And maybe it's also been shrunk from a DL DVD-8 to the smaller DVD-5 disk.
